userStories.title: Fix ProcessResult visibility so session/native APIs compile
Resolve getSession override conflict in UbuntuSessionManagerImpl
Fix SessionStateData vs SessionState mismatches in UbuntuSessionManagerImpl
Fix OkHttp API usage in RootfsDownloadService
Replace missing icon references in foreground services
Fix missing imports (Flow asStateFlow, Material Icons) and DataStore firstOrNull usage
acceptanceCriteria: No missing import / API errors remain

userStories.title: Add initial Devbox sharing data model (routes + share state) without breaking session persistence
acceptanceCriteria: A persisted model exists for devbox share state (even if stubbed)
No changes break existing session persistence
userStories.notes: Keep story small: model + repository only

userStories.title: Add UI affordance to show a shareable URL + QR code on DesktopScreen (stub URL)
acceptanceCriteria: DesktopScreen shows a share section gated behind a button/toggle
A QR code can be generated for the stub URL
userStories.notes: Do not implement networking yet; just UX + QR
